About me

Hello I'm Milan

Belgian Student Graphic Designer

Hello, I'm milan I am 17 years old and I'm a student at TSM mechelen where I study Multi Media. I ilke to game, draw and program in my free time (i also go out with friends).

Programs

Illustrator

Illustrator is a drawing program where u can make a lot of things.

Indesign

Indesign is a program based on text and lay-out where u add text and make your project look better.

Photoshop

Photoshop is a program based on making foto's special in an unique way.

After Effects

After Effects is a video ased program where u edit ur footage and make it feel whole.

Permiere Pro

Premiere Pro is an animation program where u edit cartoon drawings (from illustrator) and make them move.

Sublime Text

Sublime Text is a coding program where u make sites.

Education & Experiences

2016 - 2017

STEM

I learned a lot about coding things to lego mindstorm this year, and I also learned how to control and move a robot car. I also made a working automatic boat.

2017 - 2018

modern sciences

This year i learned how to work good with word, powerpoint and exel documents.

2018 - 2019

social sciences

This year i studied about the person and how we react and feel and how to handel with that. I also masteerd how to care for people with disabilities.

2019-2020

graphic media

This was the year i worked the first time with illustrator and indesign.

2020-2021

Multi Media

This year i started to get used to illustrator and indesign. I also started with some new programs: Premiere, after effects photoshop and i also started with coding.

2021-2022

Multi Media

This is the yea that i masterd illustrator and indesign, my coding is also progressing verry well and i am getting used to premiere and after effects
